creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: predominately black and brown textile with brown, red, tan, blue, and green embroidered decorations; textile is "T" shaped; embroidered decorations include human figures, some of which are sitting in pairs under roofed structures; textile is quilted; bottom half of "T" shape has a border decorated with embroidery and appliqu√©d strips with tan, red, and black stripes; no decorations are found on textile's back
title: Baby carrier
